name: Jonas Van Der Donckt
bio: Jonas is a rebel, romanticizes many things, sports a lot, can overthink situations, tries to live in the moment, reads books, figures himself out, and is currently a PhD student at Ghent University

name: Jeroen Van Der Donckt
bio: Jeroen is a harmonizer, is prone to overthinking, tries to live in the moment, sports a lot, reads many books, and is currently a research engineer at Ghent University.
